Member Function Documentation

void PositionIndicatorView::Draw (  const Component &  component,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [virtual]
 

Abstract method which must be implemented by derived classes.

Parameters:
component Component, which contains the data needed for drawing.
dc Pointer to the device context for drawing.
repaint_rect Bounding rectangle which describes the area, which must be repainted. For less complex drawing operations, this parameter can be ignored.

Implements View.

virtual void PositionIndicatorView::DrawPositionIndicator (  const PositionIndicator &  pos_ind,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, pure virtual]
 

Draws the data of a position indicator described by the model. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
pos_ind Position-Indicator which should be drawn.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.

Implemented in BlueSkyPositionIndicatorView, DefaultPositionIndicatorView, TestPositionIndicatorView, CTPositionIndicatorView, DefaultPositionIndicatorView, and FoggyPositionIndicatorView.
